title: "Free Jim's Mine" by Tananarive Due
description: In pursuit of freedom from slavery, a young couple must gather up their courage and spend a night underground. "Free Jim's Mine" appears in Tananarive Due's collection GHOST SUMMER: STORIES.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
